section.name: Casting Spells - a.k.a Using Magic
section.p: Using magic requires a little disiple in how you organize your project.
Using magic means faster and more reliable build processes.

This section contains information about installing magic, setting up a project index, creating a build file, and casting your first spell. By the time you finish reading the material contained here you will be well on your way to passing your next exam - "Defence Against the Dark-Arts".
